newsitem.title: UK: Japanese stocks steady to firmer in London.
newsitem.headline: Japanese stocks steady to firmer in London.

text.p: Japanese shares were steady to firmer in late trading on Tuesday as investors hunted for value amongst issues that have been pushed down recently, dealers said.

Bank stocks attracted most interest, with shares in Fuji Co Ltd (Hokkaido) up about five yen from their close in Tokyo and Dai-Ichi Kangyo Bank Ltd adding about 10 yen from the Tokyo finish, they said.
"But, overall it's quiet. We're very much in the summer doldrums," one dealer said.
The Nikkei 50 was up 2.74 points to 1,588.01 at 1354 GMT in London.
In Tokyo, the benchmark Nikkei 225 index gained 148.72 points to 19,853.89.
